import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-category-highscore-page', templateUrl: './category-highscore-page.component.html', styleUrls: ['./category-highscore-page.component.css'] }) export class CategoryHighscorePageComponent { ngOnInit() { const url = 'http://localhost:5002/kategorien'; this.http.get(url).subscribe((response) => { this.categories = response; }); this.loggedIn = this.authService.isLoggedIn(); } }
